description: This table contains basic invoice information. Each column in this table is from the INV 100 related group, and each line in the table corresponds to a claim that was sent for this invoice (INV) record.

columns.name: INV_ID
columns.description: The invoice ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the invoice number associated with the invoice record. Multiple invoice numbers can be associated with a single invoice record.

columns.name: INV_NUM
columns.description: The specific invoice number for the bill or claim. Subsequent invoice numbers may be secondary claims or primary claims that were resubmitted to the same payer.

columns.name: INV_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status for the invoice number.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Processed


Accepted


Submitted


Error


Rejected


Closed


Voided


Removed

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage record ID.

columns.name: EPM_ID
columns.description: The payer ID.

columns.name: EPM_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: EPP_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan ID.

columns.name: EPP_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: FROM_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The from (minimum) service date for the invoice number. This date is determined from the transaction on the invoice with the service date furthest in the past.

columns.name: TO_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The to (maximum) service date for the invoice number. This date is determined from the transaction on the invoice with the most recent service date.

columns.name: INV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim type for the invoice number. This column identifies whether the invoice number is a bill/statement or a claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim


Statement

columns.name: DEMAND_CLM_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column identifies the invoice number as being a demand claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CROSS_OVER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the invoice number is a crossover claim. This usually only applies to secondary claims and indicates that although the claim associated with the invoice was created, it was suppressed from a claim run.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MAILING_NAME
columns.description: The bill/statement or claim mailing name for the invoice number.

columns.name: MAILING_ADDR
columns.description: The bill/statement or claim mailing street address for the invoice number.

columns.name: CITY_STATE_ZIP
columns.description: The bill/statement or claim mailing city, state, and ZIP Code for the invoice number.

columns.name: CLM_ID
columns.description: The claim information record ID.

columns.name: CEP_ID
columns.description: The Episode ID.

columns.name: REF_ID
columns.description: The referral ID.

columns.name: REF_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: VIS_NUM
columns.description: The visit number for the invoice number.

columns.name: EAF_POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID.

columns.name: TAX_ID_NUM
columns.description: The tax ID/IRS number for the invoice number.

columns.name: TAX_ID_TYPE
columns.description: The tax ID/IRS number type for the invoice number.

columns.name: DTP_ID
columns.description: The dental treatment plan ID.

columns.name: CANCELED_INV
columns.description: Contains a list of all the canceled invoice numbers associated with the invoice record.

columns.name: REPLACED_INV
columns.description: Contains a list of all the replaced invoice numbers associated with the invoice record.

columns.name: CLM_CHANGE_RSN_COD
columns.description: Contains a list of all the claim change reason codes associated with the invoice record.

columns.name: CLM_CHANGE_COMMENT
columns.description: Contains a list of all the claim change comments associated with the invoice record.

columns.name: UB_OPER_PROV_ID
columns.description: The operating provider ID

columns.name: MAIL_PHONE
columns.description: The mailing phone number for the invoice number.

columns.name: ALTPAYR_INV_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if the invoice is for an alternate payer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CROSS_OVER_YN

columns.name: LATE_REPLACEMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Flag to indicate the late replacement claim status of the invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Replacement


Late


Late and Other Charges

columns.name: CRD_ID
columns.description: The claim reconciliation record ID.

columns.name: CLM_EXT_VAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the claim external value record for this row. Values derived from the claim print record or edited by the user will be stored in the claim external value. Form output will be based on the claim external value.

columns.name: MAIL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the mailing address country.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CLM_ACCEPT_DT
columns.description: The invoice accept date.

columns.name: CLM_DX_CODE_SET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code set of the diagnoses on the invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ICD-9-CM


ICD-10-CM


ICD-10-CA


ICD-10-UK


DBC


ICD-10 Dutch


ICD-10-AM


A&E Diagnoses


SKS


ICD-10-THL


ICPC-2


ICD-O-3


ICD-10-GM


ICD-9-CM Supplemental


ICD-10-BE


ICD-10-NO

columns.name: FILING_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column holds the filing order position of the claim coverage at the time claims were processed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Secondary


Tertiary


Post-Tertiary


Unknown

columns.name: CLAIM_RUN_NUM
columns.description: The claim run number.

columns.name: DEMAND_CLAIM_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the invoice was created in a demand claim run.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CROSS_OVER_YN

columns.name: SRC_INV_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the invoice number that generated the current invoice number.

columns.name: PREDETERMINATION_YN
columns.description:
Stores a Yes/No indicator that the associated record represents a request for a predetermination of benefits.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CROSS_OVER_YN

columns.name: PREDICTED_PAY_DATE
columns.description: The predicted payment response date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.

columns.name: SUGGESTED_FOL_UP_DATE
columns.description: The suggested initial follow-up date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.
